entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING, La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 a.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
